tool_description: Live Football Streaming in HD quality, providing real-time access to football matches.

api_list.name: Match Embed Link
api_list.description: Fetches a live streaming link for a specific football match.

required_parameters.name: matchid
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the football match.

api_list.name: Football Live
api_list.description: Retrieves information about currently live football matches.
